verbs.description: [V: is] [ARG1: your representative] [ARG2: one of the 10 poorest people in congress] money and power tend to go hand in hand so it easy to assume all members of congress are sitting atop vast personal fortunes for many this could n’t be further from the truth christopher murphy congress mike d rogers senator tim scott dennis a ross opensecretsorg alcee hastings eliot engel emanuel cleaver united states congress david valadao
